Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red  Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier fire department activity near 87th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red  Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier fire department activity near 87th. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from 95th to Garfield in both directions and will conclude at 11:35pm

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.
